attributes.name: Intracerebral circulation involved
attributes.description: Which circulation has a perfusion abnormality?

attributes.name: Perfusion mismatch
attributes.description: DIscordant or equivalent volumes of involved penumbra and ischemic core.  Expressed as none, left MCA or right MCA territory.

attributes.name: Ischemic core volume
attributes.description: The volume of brain on CBF maps with less than 30% cerebral blood flow indicating ischemic core

attributes.name: Ischemic penumbra volume
attributes.description: Volume of brain where the maximum transit time exceeds 6 seconds indicative of ischemic penumbra

attributes.name: Mismatch volume
attributes.description: The difference in brain volume between the ischemic penumbra (Tmax > 6 sec) and the ischemic core (CBF <30%)

attributes.name: Mismatch ratio
attributes.description: Mismatch ratio is defined as the perfusion deficit divide by the infarct core volume (=volume of tissue with Tmax >6 s/volume of tissue with rCBF <30%).
